留言內容: Either this will be consistent with your taste in clothing, or not.  No middle ground here.  Don't order it if you consider it too bold.  As for the garment, it came as though it had spent considerable time under ground moving equipment - the single most wrinkled item I have ever witnessed, as if impressed by an elephant's ass.  But an iron ON THE LOWEST SETTING seemed to do the trick, and now I love it.
